column5: I was wondering if there are motels in the town of Ignace and what chance a group would have of getting a roomm say on the 23rd. of May we will be coming from the east up thru Upsala this is a new area for us not having been this far west into Ontario.thanks len in michigan
The best hotel in Ignace is the Northwoods. Call now to book tho - busy time of year.Phone number is 807-934-2296
